Detailed Description

Push button which can be drawn in one of four button styles.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzStyledButton::ButtonStyle

Enumerated Button Styles.

Enumerator:
BCommand 

The button is drawn as a typical Push Button. (QStyle::PE_PanelButtonCommand is used to draw the button's frame)

BTool 

The button is drawn as a typical Tool Button. (QStyle::PE_PanelButtonTool is used to draw the button's frame)

BDefault 

The button is drawn as a Default Push Button. (QStyle::PE_FrameDefaultButton is used to draw the button's frame)

BBasic 

The button is drawn with the style's Button Bevel. (QStyle::PE_PanelButtonBevel is used to draw the button's frame)

BNoFrame 

The button is drawn without a frame.

BCustom 

The button is drawn with a custom style. This state cannot be set explicitly. Instead, it is set automatically by setCustomPrimitive() and setCustomTextStyle().

void DzStyledButton::setButtonLabelStateFlags ( QStyle::State &  flags  )  [protected, virtual]

This method can be overridden in subclasses to set additional states for the button label when it is being drawn. The default implementation just calls setButtonStateFlags()

void DzStyledButton::setButtonStateFlags ( QStyle::State &  flags  )  [protected, virtual]

This method can be overridden in subclasses to set additional states for the button when it is being drawn

void DzStyledButton::setButtonStyle ( ButtonStyle  style  )  [virtual]

Sets the style that the button is drawn in. style can be any ButtonStyle value except for DzStyledButton::BCustom. The button style is set to DzStyledButton::BCustom by calling setCustomPrimitive() and/or setCustomTextStyle(). If DzStyledButton::BCustom is passed in, this method has no effect.

void DzStyledButton::setButtonTextFormat ( int  format  )  [virtual]

Sets the format that the button text is drawn in

Parameters:
format The Qt::AlignmentFlags and Qt::TextFlags OR'd together for the button label
void DzStyledButton::setCustomDownArrowPrimitive ( QStyle::PrimitiveElement  prim  ) 

Sets the primitive element to be used to draw this button's arrow. This method overrides the primitive that is used by default for the current ButtonStyle.

Parameters:

Sets the text style to be used to draw this button's text. This method overrides the text style that is used by default for the current ButtonStyle.
